title: Lenskart sees growth in “true rural” and foreign markets. Does it have the vision to run the course?

description: Lenskart intends to penetrate underserved rural markets with low-priced glasses and replicate its India story in expensive overseas markets like Singapore. But both opportunities and pitfalls lie ahead for the eyewear company as it seeks to execute ambitious plans.
